column4: In Firefox, if I download a file, then right click on the file in the Downloads window and select "Open container folder", I get a dialog the pops up asking me to associate the file with a program. I thought this should open up Gnome's file explorer to the folder the file was saved in.
select ur preferred explorer from preffered apps in System > preffered applications !!
I don't see an option to select Nautilus anywhere there
